Up for your consideration is this T206 Magee Hindu. Minor creasing, small mark near name, major edge wear. Back has no paper loss. 

[url][IMG]http://i434.photobucket.com/albums/qq66/nollpm/Magee_0002-3.jpg[/IMG][/url]

[url][IMG]http://i434.photobucket.com/albums/qq66/nollpm/MageeBack_0002-3.jpg[/IMG][/url]

Take it now for $SOLD dlvd or make a reasonable offer.
